name: roomer.live
description: Roomler.live - Video collaboration tool using WebRTC (Janus Gateway)
author: Goran Jovanov

scripts.start:api-e2e: cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=e2e cross-env PORT=4001 node api/index.js
scripts.start:ui-e2e: cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=e2e cross-env PORT_API=4001 cross-env PORT=4000 node server/index.js
scripts.test:api: cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=api node tests/drop-database.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=api ava --tap --verbose
scripts.test:ui: cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=ui node tests/drop-database.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=ui ava
scripts.test:e2e: cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=e2e node tests/drop-database.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=e2e ava
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=all node tests/drop-database.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=test ava cross-env TEST=e2e all
scripts.test-report:api: cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=api node tests/drop-database.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=api nyc ava --tap --timeout=300000
scripts.test-report:ui: cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=ui node tests/drop-database.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=ui nyc ava --tap --timeout=300000
scripts.test-report:e2e: cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=e2e node tests/drop-database.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=e2e nyc ava --tap --timeout=300000
scripts.test-report: cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=all node tests/drop-database.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=all nyc ava --tap --timeout=300000
